abstract.para: Dissolved organic carbon collected from Imnavait Creek for summer 1988.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Imnavait Creek, Alaska, U.S.A. 68 37' N, 149 17' W.

description.para:
Log of changes:
9Mar90. Changed file name from IDOC88 to 88SCIDOC Removed the old "required" columns from the dataset (E,NUM,ABIO,BIO). separated the DATE column to BEGDATE and ENDDATE.

para.literalLayout: Creek water was collected via a bilge pump fitted with a 0.5 mm mesh filter from the fourth pond upstream of the Imnaviat Creek flume. Collected water was placed in 4 liter beakers and evaporated using a Coleman propane stove. After evaporating a sufficiently large volume of pond water to provide adequate carbon for dating purposes the resulting concentrated DOC and any DOC that had dried to the walls of the beaker was scraped from the beaker and stored in a scintillation vial. (10) NOTES AND COMMENTS: All collections were prepared for radiocarbon dating by evaporating to dryness in a 100 degree Celcius oven and scraping any dried carbon off the walls of the scintillation vials.

Reference Citations: (16) VARIABLE FORMAT FORM: FILENAME: IDOC88.WK1 File Type*: LOTUS Column No. Column Name** Type Width Decimals 1 SITE ALPHNUM 7 2 D/D ALPHNUM 6 3 BEGDATE DATE 9 4 ENDDATE DATE 9 5 VOL NUMERIC 4 1 6 AGE NUMERIC 7 7 COMMENT TEXT <250 NOTE: * Rank (in preference) of type of data files which can be submitted. 1) Dbase (.DBF) 2) spreadsheet - Lotus (.WK1) 3) Ascii - must be comma delimited (.PRN)

Variable Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE site of measurement y D/D distance from flume n BEGDATE beginning of sampling DD-MMM-YY n ENDDATE End of sampling DD-MMM-YY n VOL water volume evaporated 0.5L n AGE radiocarbon date n COMMENTS notes about data n
